com.icodici.universa.node2

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.icodici.universa.node2.Notification
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ItemNotification

    public abstract class Notification
extends java.lang.Object
    Notifications are binary-effective packable units to transfer between nodes with v2 UDP protocols.

    Each notification should inherit from Notification and register self with uniqie integer code in static constructor using registerClass(int, Class). It also must provide provate nonparametric constructor and implement abstract methods writeTo(Boss.Writer), readFrom(Boss.Reader) and getTypeCode().

    Notifications could be packed together in a compact form. Use pack(Collection) and unpack(NodeInfo, byte[]).

      • getTypeCode

        protected abstract int getTypeCode()
        return the code the class had registered self with using registerClass(int, Class) in the static constructor. Note that the class that did not register self can't be used by the Universa system
        Returns:
        int unique notification type code

      • registerClass

        protected static void registerClass(int code,
                                    java.lang.Class<? extends Notification> klass)
        Register class with a type code (same as its instace must return with getTypeCode() to use with UDP notifications.
        Parameters:
        code - unique type code (per class)
        klass - is inherited Notification class
